article.title: artificial organ
article.p:
artificial organ
, any machine, device, or other material that is used to replace the functions of a faulty or missing organ or other part of the human body. Artificial organs include the
artificial heart
and
pacemaker
(
qq.v.
), the use of
dialysis
(
q.v.
) to perform kidney functions, and the use of artificial substitutes for missing limbs (
see
prosthesis
).
